About Me

I am currently an MSc student at Mcgill University and Mila, focusing on Computational Linguistics and Natural Language Processing. My main supervisor is Timothy J. Oâ€™Donnell and I am therefore part of the Montreal Computational and Quantitative Linguistics Lab (MCQLL) where I organize our weekly reading group-style meetings.
